page.title: 20LADYBANK PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: {Our school is an attractive stone {building built in approx. 1860. There {are 127 pupils in five composite {classes.}There is a dining room, music room, a general purpose room used for science, art, craft and baking. A hall for P.E. & drama.{We are lucky to have {five visiting teachers.}The music and drama teachers come once a fortnight, P.E. once a month, art four times a term. A wind instrument tutor takes five pupils once a week. There are {after school clubs}for gymnastics, badminton & netball.{Fridays are {special. Three children from P.7 cook {their own lunch and invite three {guests. They plan, budget, shop, cook {and clear up. The afternoon is devoted {to activities. P. 7 is divided into {three groups, one baking, one playing {badminton and the third doing craft.
